trans-unit.source: An error has occurred, please repeat the process!
trans-unit.target: Prišlo je do napake, ponovite postopek!

trans-unit.source: Should the invitation really be reversed?
trans-unit.target: Ali bi bilo treba vabilo res razveljaviti?

trans-unit.source: Should the member really be removed from the board?
trans-unit.target: Bi morali člana res odstraniti z deske?
